item.title: Lo??c Le Meur & LeWeb10 (interview)
item.description: These are the responses given by Loïc to the short questionnary I sent him. He was really quick tp answer! What is LeWeb like for Loïc Le Meur? LeWeb is a tool box for the european entpreneur: from the inspiration to find ideas to start a business to networking with Google, Microsoft or Facebook and raising angel or VC money. They can do it all during two days. This year we even have a “how to get acquired” panel to help them understand how to sell their business if they like.
